text: "Love Like There's Tomorrow" is a song written and recorded by American country music artist Aaron Tippin and his wife Thea Tippin. It was released in December 2002 as the third single from the album Stars & Stripes. The song reached #35 on the Billboard Hot Country Singles & Tracks chart. ==Chart performance== {|class="wikitable sortable" !align="left"|Chart (2002-2003) !align="center"|Peak position |- |} ==References== Category:2002 singles Category:2002 songs Category:Aaron Tippin songs Category:Songs written by Aaron Tippin Category:Lyric Street Records singles
